detail_desc: Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Shirt in sturdy denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Top in an airy mulberry silk weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves and decorative seams at the sides.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, drawstring down the front and a smocked back. Elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Leggings with wide elastication at the waist.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and easy-access flap pockets.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.
Fine-knit jumper with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Set with a top and pair of shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist and frills at the top.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with matching accessories.
Top in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck with gathers at the top, ties at the shoulders in a contrasting colour, a seam at the waist with gathers and a frill, and a flare to the hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Shopper in paper straw with two imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 17 cm. Height 38 cm. Width 38 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Top in soft, block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a high stand-up collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an opening and press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a button, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes along the sides. Size 150x200 cm.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.
Earrings with a round, slightly curved metal disc at the top and a large, tear-shaped resin pendant. Length 6.5 cm.
Blouse in a cotton weave with pleats at the waist, a wide tie around the neck and concealed fastening at the front. Dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. Plastic sidepieces with a stylish inset section in gold-coloured metal.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Earrings in embossed metal. Length 4.5 cm.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, a draped detail at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a pompom on top.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut shirt in soft flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the opening. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, patterned viscose twill with a double-layered stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with pleats and reinforcement inside the shoulder seams for added volume, and close-fitting cuffs with a concealed zip. Visible seams front and back and gathers in the side seams for a defined waist. High slit at the front. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a smocked hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details and a splatter print. Button fly and frayed, raw-edge hems. Regular fit.

Cropped, fitted blouse in satin with an open back, sweetheart neckline and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Narrow crossover straps at the back and a horizontal tie at the hem. Jersey-lined front.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut coat in sturdy faux fur with a large collar, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a visible fly with press-studs, and patch pockets front and back.
Set in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and a concealed button at the front. Jersey lining.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width 6 cm.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long sleeves and roll edges.

Set with a top and trousers in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Top in soft velour with a motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood and buttons down the front. Small patch pocket at one side and double-layered front. Trousers with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Waist belt with a metal buckle. The belt narrows at the ends. Width 2-4 cm.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless satin top with ties that create a draped effect at the hem. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, flap front pockets and gathered 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short trenchcoat in a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, tab with a button at the top and shoulder tabs with a button. Off-centre buttons at the front and a loose yoke at one side. Wide raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab and plastic buckle at the cuffs. Front pockets with a decorative flap, a detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist, and a gently rounded hem. Lined.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
